scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Arnow received a number of letters from fans and critics, even before the publication of her first novel, Mountain Path. While the majority of letters only comment on Arnow's works, some letters include requests for autographs and inquiries for sources of genealogical information from the nonfiction pieces (particularly Seedtime on the Cumberland and Flowering of the Cumberland). Some of the inquiries regarding genealogical or other historical information are detailed and specific; no notice is given as to whether or not Arnow personally responded to the research questions.
